Package limitedlibrarymanagementsystem

Class Book

java.lang.Object
limitedlibrarymanagementsystem.Book
public class Book extends Object
Class to define Book objects. As required per final project problem statement. Final Project for Programming Patterns course - Fall 2021.

    • addBook

      public void addBook(Book book) throws Exception
      Creates a new entry in the Books table to add a new book to the catalog. Sets “Issued” attribute to zero and addedDate to the current date.
      Parameters:
      book - the book to be added to the library catalog
      Throws:
      Exception

    • issueBook

      public Boolean issueBook(Book book, Student student) throws Exception
      If student information is valid and book is available to be borrowed, the number of copies(“Quantity”) will be decreased by one and the number of Copies issued (“Issued”) will be increased by one. A new entry in “IssuedBooks” table is added.
      Parameters:
      book - the book to be issued
      student - the student who wants to borrow the book
      Returns:
      true if the book was successfully issued.
      Throws:
      Exception

    • returnBook

      public Boolean returnBook(Book book, Student student) throws Exception
      If the student information is valid and book information for that student is also valid, the number of copies “Quantity” will be increased by one and the number of copies issued will be decreased by one.The corresponding record in IssuedBooks table is deleted from the table.
      Parameters:
      book - the book to be returned
      student - the student who borrowed the book
      Returns:
      true if the book was successfully returned
      Throws:
      Exception - exception thrown

    • viewCatalog

      public static Map<String,String> viewCatalog() throws Exception
      This method returns a map containing all data retrieved from the Books table.
      Returns:
      a map of all the books in the library
      Throws:
      Exception - exception thrown

    • viewIssuedBooks

      public Map<String,String> viewIssuedBooks() throws Exception
      Retrieves all data from IssuedBooks table and returns them as a Map. The map is sorted by “SN”.
      Returns:
      a map of issued/borrowed books(sorted SN) in the library
      Throws:
      Exception

    • viewIssuedBooksFrench

      public Map<String,String> viewIssuedBooksFrench() throws Exception
      Retrieves all data from IssuedBooks table and returns them as a Map. The map is sorted by “SN”.
      Returns:
      a map of issued/borrowed books(sorted SN) in the library
      Throws:
      Exception
